channel.title: Credit Card Industry on FinanClub

item.title: DFS
item.description: score:34 Chances: The acquisition by Capital One could potentially give them access to Discover’s payments network, creating a bigger competitor to Visa and Mastercard. Americans have become increasingly reliant on credit cards since the pandemic, which could lead to a bigger market for Capital One’s credit cards.
